price: 49. Tidakkah engkau memperhatikan orang-orang yang menganggap dirinya suci (orang Yahudi dan Nasrani)? Sebenarnya Allah menyucikan siapa yang Dia kehendaki dan mereka tidak dizalimi sedikit pun.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُزَكُّونَ أَنفُسَهُمۚ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يُزَكِّي مَن يَشَآءُ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yuzakkūna anfusahum bali al-lahu yuzakkī man yashāu walā yuẓ'lamūna fatīlan
translations: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed
